title: How to create my own technology business - Quora
tags: Young Entrepreneur and Startup Founder Advice

response.answer_text: Maintaining a PC repair business based on offering parts and items is a smart thought. To figure out what your time is worth, examine what your nearby rivalry is charging. When you should arrange new parts, for example, modems or motherboards, for an occupation, you'll have to make the buy worth yours and your client's time. In case you're hoping to offer and benefit computers inside of your neighborhood group and remain an one-individual operation, private clients might suit you best. They're by and large more receptive to publicizing and marketing than little business proprietors.
How about the entertainment business? Perhaps actors can be replaced and you can model their behaviors, voice and expression in order to sell actor-AI
